text: Christoph Galandi (born 21 September 1962) is a German rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:German male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of West Germany Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Berlin
title: Christoph Galandi
